testcase.name: As a admin, I can get all user
As a admin, I can get a single user
As a admin, I can limits the user result
As a admin, I can sort user by descending
As a admin, I can sort user by ascending
As a admin, I can add new user
As a admin, I cannot add new user with empty fields
